Major_Arcs.title: Human Meteor's Initial Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Human Meteor and his first case involving underwater threats and espionage.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Taxi Fare
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Human Meteor and Duke's taxi ride leading to the waterfront.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi to the Waterfront and Suspicious Followers

sub_scenes.title: Transformation and Initial Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Duke transforms into Human Meteor and confronts cop shooters, leading to a rooftop fight and hospital visit.

narrative_arcs.title: The Chase and Human Meteor Transformation
Hospital Visit and Jap Sub Conspiracy

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration Plan and Stowaway Mission
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans to infiltrate the yacht using Toby as a stowaway, leading to Toby's discovery.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Toby's Peril
sub_scenes.description: Events on the yacht unfold, with Pete discovering the depth chart, Toby being thrown overboard, and Duke sensing danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby's Plunge and Cry for Help

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Confrontation and Namor's Attack
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor dives, discovers the submarine, encounters divers, and Namor intervenes.

narrative_arcs.title: Divers Spot and Approach Human Meteor
Divers Attack Human Meteor with Derogatory Remark
Continuing Underwater Confrontation and Diver's Mishap
Ship Observes Geyser and Prepares to Evade

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Treachery Revealed
sub_scenes.description: Duke returns to the yacht, investigates Peter's cabin, and uncovers Peter's treachery using the depth map.

narrative_arcs.title: Duke Escapes and Arrives at the Yacht
Searching for the Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Return Home
sub_scenes.description: Duke concludes the day, visits Holden in the hospital, and returns home with Toby.

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads and the Nazi Sabotage Plot
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Liberty Lads and their fight against Nazi spies and saboteurs, centered around a wallet and a garage.

sub_scenes.title: Initial Confrontation and Ambulance Scene
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Liberty Lads in action, followed by a shift to a domestic scene with an ambulance and injured man.

sub_scenes.title: The Dropped Wallet and Garage Lead
sub_scenes.description: Boys find a dropped wallet leading them to a bus company garage and a mysterious encounter.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dropped Wallet and the Chase
Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Disguised

sub_scenes.title: Garage Confrontation and Deadly Plan
sub_scenes.description: Boys arrive at the garage, are led to Mr. Horst, and face a deadly carbon monoxide plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Returned, Boys to See the Boss

sub_scenes.title: Uprising and Violent Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Chaos ensues, threats escalate, and Major Bronson violently intervenes to control the situation.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Help and Barracks Attack
sub_scenes.description: Boys decide to seek help, leading to a marine sergeant's involvement and an attack on the barracks revealing sabotage plans.

sub_scenes.title: Office Fight and Marine Victory
sub_scenes.description: Office fight ensues, Marines arrive, and the conflict resolves with victory and recognition despite the Major's injury.

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and the Kidnapping of Rosita
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows 'The Champ' and Henry in South America as they get entangled in the kidnapping of Rosita and confront El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and South American Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of 'The Champ' and Henry in a desert setting, followed by their discovery and confrontation in a South American town.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Henry's Mission
Discovery and Confrontation in South America

sub_scenes.title: Detention and Kidnapping Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Detention and interrogation of 'The Champ' and Henry, revealing Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Journey and Mama's Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Two men discuss El Tigre, get forced into a car, and arrive at a house where 'Mama' reveals a twist about rescuing Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Whispers of El Tigre and Forced Car Entry
Arrival, Mama's Reveal, and Rosita's Rescue

sub_scenes.title: Hideout Infiltration and El Tigre's Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Planning to approach El Tigre's hideout, infiltration under darkness, and the reveal of El Tigre himself.

narrative_arcs.title: Stage Dollar Diversion and El Tigre's Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Shifting Accusations
sub_scenes.description: Interrogation tactics, search for Rosita, and El Tigre's denial and accusation against Axis agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Rosita and Threatening El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Mission and Rosita Found
sub_scenes.description: News of Rosita's location by Axis agents, El Tigre's rescue plan, horseback assault, hotel infiltration, and finally finding Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: News of Rosita and the Rescue Plan
The Determined Ride to Rescue Rosita

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Various fights, government intervention, and the aftermath of the rescue operation.

narrative_arcs.title: Machine Gun Threat and Protective Stand

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in the Jungle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, involving combat, capture, and a complex moral dilemma.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Reporting
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan engages in jungle combat, followed by a military report about a grave matter involving him and Captain Lawton.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan arrives in the jungle, senses danger, and is ambushed by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Captivity and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: Dolan is captured, brought before Grauer, faces torture threats, and is interrogated by a foreign agent.

narrative_arcs.title: Brought Before Grauer and Suspicious Object
Orders, Forced Writing, and Torture Threat

sub_scenes.title: Justification, Flashback, and Vengeance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan justifies his actions, flashes back to Sam's burning, and vows vengeance amidst burning huts.

narrative_arcs.title: Flashback: Sam Burning and Dolan's Grim Justification
Grauer's Indifference and Orders Amidst Burning Huts
Dolan's Justification for Burning and Vengeful Declaration

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Ambush and Alliance
sub_scenes.description: Dolan's ambush, the chief's accidental death, and the formation of an unexpected alliance with the natives.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Dilemma and Discipline
sub_scenes.description: Captain's dilemma, Sam's fight, and Dolan's disciplinary spanking for disobedience.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twinkle Twins and the Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them to a hospital and a confrontation with racketeer Farnacci.

sub_scenes.title: City Street Incident and News Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins reacting to a street incident and receiving a murder case assignment at the Weston Call newspaper.

narrative_arcs.title: City Street Confrontation with Twinkle Twins

sub_scenes.title: Evidence and Hospital Lead
sub_scenes.description: Evidence against Tom Reilly is presented, and the Twins decide to follow a lead to the hospital.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry about Guy Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Miss Reilly's Condition
sub_scenes.description: At the hospital, the Twins encounter resistance but gain access to Miss Reilly and learn about her serious condition and need for a blood transfusion.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Reception and Inquiry about Miss Reilly
Persuasion and Access to Miss Reilly
Meeting Miss Reilly - The Sick Little Girl
Sympathy for Miss Reilly and Blood Type Discussion

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci Connection and Radio Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Twins decide to contact Elijah, receive instructions, and a radio broadcast reveals crucial connections to Farnacci.

narrative_arcs.title: Candy Store and Phone Call to Elijah
Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store
Elijah's Instructions: Connect Farnacci, Banker, Haskel, and Brown
Radio Broadcast about Farnacci's Gang and Banker Threat
Decision to Look for Tom Reilly in Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Irish Section Search and Mrs. Murphy's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section leads to Mrs. Murphy, who reveals Tom's sacrifice for his daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Mrs. Murphy's Revelation: Tom Reilly's Sacrifice

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Ambush and Street Justice
sub_scenes.description: Taxi ambush witnessed by Dan, leading to a pursuit, neighborhood blockade, street brawl, and police intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Taxi Ambush and Dan as Witness

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Crisis and Community Blood Drive
sub_scenes.description: Aftermath of the brawl, hospital transport, dire news about Tom Reilly, community blood appeal, and transfusion efforts.

narrative_arcs.title: Blood Type Mismatch and Community Appeal
Blood Type Match and Transfusion Preparation

sub_scenes.title: Farnacci's Arrest and Happy Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Public outcry leads to police action, Farnacci's impending arrest, and a celebration of Lassie Reilly's recovery, resolving the murder mystery storyline.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning Police Intervention and Media Coverage
Accusation and Denial Regarding Blood Donation
Confirmation of Farnacci's Gang Affiliation and Impending Arrest
Celebration of Recovery and Future Adventures
